overview.summary: The Field Slicer module reduces the dimension of a topologically regular field by 1 dimension.

description.p: The Field Slicer module reduces the dimension of a topologically regular field by 1 dimension.
The Arbitrary Field Slicer input port is a field that has any topology. The field will be sliced and piped to the output port.

net.title: FieldArbitrarySlicer Regression Test
net.p: Read in the utah torso model and display it's boundary for reference. Then slice the model using the FieldArbitrarySlicer module to select an arbitrary plane from the torso.
This network can be found at src/nets/Modules/FieldsCreate/FieldArbitrarySlicer.net.

net.title: FieldArbitrarySlicer-testimgi Regression Test
net.p: Create a sample field, populate it with a nice synthetic data set, and move it to an arbitrary non-identity transformation in space. Then FieldArbitrarySlicer is used to extract a particular plane or scanline from the field and the result is visualized for comparison purposes.
This network can be found at src/nets/Modules/FieldsCreate/FieldArbitrarySlicer-testimgi.net.
